value:
$WmMPID_ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_F_Normal,Face|What was it with those guys? They
attacked us out of nowhere!$k$p$WmMPID_ヒューベルト,ch17_06_Hubert_M_Normal,Face|And on monastery grounds, no less.
It's a wonder that the goddess didn't
smite them outright. Heh.$k$p$WmMPID_メルセデス,ch17_17_Mercedes_F_Normal,Face|We seem to have been separated
from the others. I hope that they're
all right.$k$p$WmMPID_ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_F_Normal,Face|Speaking of which, where's Petra?
She was right here, and now she's—$k$p$WmMPID_ペトラ,ch17_12_Petra_F_Normal,Face|My returning is complete. Are you
having injuries?$k$p$WmMPID_メルセデス,ch17_17_Mercedes_F_Normal,Face|Oh, thank goodness you're safe,
Petra! No, we all seem to have
gotten off unscathed.$k$p$WmMPID_ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_F_Normal,Face|Um. I hate to be the bearer of bad
news, but some people are coming
this way. They look suspicious.$k$p$WmMPID_ペトラ,ch17_12_Petra_F_Normal,Face|I will be capturing the suspicious
people. The chances say that they
are friends of our enemies!$k$p$WmMPID_ヒューベルト,ch17_06_Hubert_M_Normal,Face|I'm not so sure. If they wanted to
attack us, they would have done so
by now. Petra, stand down!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Hey, ease up! We're not your enemy.
We come peacefully.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We are from another world, and we
could use your help. We don't want
to fight you.$k$p$WmMPID_メルセデス,ch17_17_Mercedes_F_Normal,Face|Oh my. Another world? I don't think
I quite understand.$k$p$WmMPID_ヒューベルト,ch17_06_Hubert_M_Normal,Face|You're looking for recruits, and you
turn to four students? Sounds like a
trap to me.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|They all look completely incredulous.
This will take a while to explain...$k$p
